prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a vibrant blue body and green accents.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a slug but has a leafy top.
Imagine a creature with a shiny, aquatic body and unique shell-like features.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has a playful personality.

Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of a slug and a plant.
Design a Pokemon that has a rounded body shape and a colorful, patterned exterior.
